name: Set Layout Sequence
description: Orchestrate a sequence of layout changes with timing for progressive disclosure UX patterns. Perfect for guided tours, multi-step workflows, or automated demonstrations. Each step can have a different layout mode, slot configuration, and transition style.

steps.description: Array of layout steps to execute in sequence. Each step defines the layout mode, duration, optional slot configuration, and transition style.

mode.description: Layout mode to use for this step

duration.description: How long to stay in this layout before moving to next step (milliseconds). Use 0 to stay indefinitely (requires manual progression).

slots.description: Optional slot configuration for this step. Same structure as set_ui_layout slots parameter.

transition.description: Transition animation style: 'instant' (no animation), 'subtle' (200ms fade), 'normal' (300ms ease), 'dramatic' (500ms spring with stagger).

loop.description: Whether to loop back to the first step after the last step completes. Default: false.

onComplete.description: Optional: Message to send to chat when sequence completes (only if loop is false).
